oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Commission to practice what it preaches
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Eichert, Christian
Zorn, Alexander
Dabbert, Stephan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An ORGAP (Evaluation of the European Action Plan for Organic Food and Farming) research project paper questions whether the EU Commission is line with its own Principles of good governance regarding the revision process of the EU Organic Regulation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Eichert, Christian; Zorn, Alexander and Dabbert, Stephan (2006) Commission to practice what it preaches. [Commission to practice what it preaches.] The Organic Standard (Issue 63), pp. 3-5.
